item.exposure_expanded.telescopic_lens.t: Just a little bit higher zoom for long range shots.
item.exposure_expanded.panoramic_lens.to: Very wide, for shots with multiple subjects.
item.exposure_expanded.gameboy_film.tool: Vanity film with colors resembling the monochrome Gameboy palette.
item.exposure_expanded.nes_film.tooltip: Vanity film with all 54 colors an NES can display.
item.exposure_expanded.c64_film.tooltip: Vanity film with the 16 colors a Commodore 64 can display.
item.exposure_expanded.cga_film.tooltip: Vanity film with the 4 colors of CGA Palette 1 (High Intensity).
item.exposure_expanded.hicap_hisen_black: High-Capacity High-Sensitivity Black and White Film
item.exposure_expanded.hires_hisen_black: High-Resolution High-Sensitivity Black and White Film
item.exposure_expanded.instant_hires_bla: Instant High-Resolution Black and White Slide
Makes the image soft and slightly blurry.
Might not be noticeable in most photos.
item.exposure_expanded.art_filter.toolti: Makes pixels large, circular and blurry.
item.exposure_expanded.bits_filter.toolt: Gives the image a retro effect.
item.exposure_expanded.blobs_2_filter.to: Makes pixels large, circular and blurry.
item.exposure_expanded.color_convolve_fi: Increases the perceived saturation of the image.
item.exposure_expanded.deconverge_filter: Gives the image a chromatic aberration effect.
item.exposure_expanded.desaturate_filter: Desaturates the image, but not fully.
item.exposure_expanded.flip_filter.toolt: Flips the image upside down vertically.
item.exposure_expanded.ntsc_filter.toolt: Adds a strong blur and scanlines.
item.exposure_expanded.pencil_filter.too: Makes the image look like a pencil drawing.
item.exposure_expanded.phosphor_filter.t: Adds motion blur. Use while moving.
item.exposure_expanded.spider_filter.too: Makes the image look like the sight of a spider.
item.exposure_expanded.wobble_filter.too: Adds wobbles and randomly cycles the hue.
The hue will be static in the final image.
